title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 23, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1939 that the governments of Germany and the Soviet Union signed the Nazi-Soviet Non-Aggression Pact, shocking many American communists.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1939 that the governments of Germany and the Soviet Union signed the Nazi-Soviet Non-Aggression Pact, shocking many American communists.
